ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying at Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrel sanctuary.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.2_0: On one occasion Devadatta pursued schism in the Sangha, a break in transmission.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.4_0: “Devadatta speaks contrary to the Teaching and the training.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.5_0: How can he pursue schism in the Sangha?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.6_0: But Kokālika, Kaṭamodakatissaka, Khaṇḍadeviyā-putta, and Samuddadatta said to those monks,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.8_0: Devadatta who speaks contrary to the Teaching and the training.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.9_0: And he speaks with our consent and approval. He knows about us and speaks for us, and we approve of this.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.10_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Udāyī,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.11_0: “How can these monks support Devadatta’s pursuit of schism in the Sangha?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.12_0: They rebuked those monks in many ways and then told the Buddha. Soon afterwards he had the Sangha gathered and questioned the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.13_0: “Is it true, monks, that some monks support Devadatta’s pursuit of schism in the Sangha?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.16_0: “... Monks, how can those foolish men support Devadatta’s pursuit of schism in the Sangha?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.17_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.18_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.19.1_0: ‘That monk may have one, two, or three.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.21_0: this monk who speaks in accordance with the Teaching and the Monastic Law.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.22_0: And he speaks with our consent and acceptance. He knows about us and speaks for us, and we approve of this.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.23_0: The monks should correct those monks,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.25_0: this monk speaks contrary to the Teaching and the training.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.26_0: Don’t consent to schism in the Sangha.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.27_0: Stay with the Sangha, for a united Sangha—in concord, in harmony, having a joint recitation—is at ease.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.28_0: If those monks still continue as before, the monks should press them up to three times to make them stop.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.29_0: If they then stop, all is well.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:1.30_0: If they do not stop, they commit an offense entailing suspension.’”

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.18_0: this monk speaks contrary to the Teaching and the training.

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.26_0: If those who heard about it do not say anything, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.62_0: After the motion, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.63_0: After each of the first two announcements, she commits a serious offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.64_0: When the last announcement is finished, she commits an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.65_0: For one who commits the offense entailing suspension, the offense of wrong conduct and the serious offenses are annulled.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.66_0: Two or three may be pressed together, but not more than that.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.67_0: He commits an offense entailing suspension:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:2.68_0: ... Therefore, too, it is called “an offense entailing suspension”.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:3.1.1_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and they perceive it as such, but they do not stop, they commit an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:3.1.2_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but they are unsure of it, and they do not stop, they commit an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:3.1.3_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but they perceive it as illegitimate, and they do not stop, they commit an offense entailing suspension.

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:3.1.6_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and they perceive it as such, they commit an offense of wrong conduct.

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ss11:3.2.8_0: The eleventh rule, the training rule on siding with a schism, is finished.
